entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow or rain. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023
